# R Code

## R Code
Here is some **R** code

\scriptsize
```{r, eval = FALSE}
# Load data
data(fivethirtyeight::flying)

# Calculate count of education among male flyers
fivethirtyeight::flying %>% 
  group_by(gender) %>% 
  filter(gender == "Male") %>% 
  count(education)
```

# Equations

## Equations
- Calculate sample variance ($s^2$)

\begin{equation}
{s}^{2}=\frac{{\Sigma(X-\bar{X})}^{2}}{N-1} 
\label{eq:variance}
\end{equation}
